mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_hotel( user_sid, title, content, delete_yn, status, created_date, modified_date ) VALUES ( #{user_sid}, #{title}, #{content}, 'N', #{status}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_hotel WHERE delete_yn = 'N' ORDER BY created_date DESC
SELECT TH.*, TU.user_name FROM tb_hotel as TH left outer join tb_user as TU on TH.user_sid = TU.user_sid WHERE hotel_sid = #{hotel_sid}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_hotel SET title = #{title}, status = #{status}, content = #{content}, modified_date = now() WHERE hotel_sid = #{hotel_sid}
UPDATE tb_hotel SET delete_yn = 'Y' WHERE hotel_sid = #{hotel_sid}
